text: Silvio Longobucco (5 June 1951 â€“ 2 April 2022) was an Italian professional footballer. He played as a defender. Longobucco was born in Scalea, Italy. His playing career lasted from 1969 until 1983. He played for Ternana Calcio, Juventus F.C., Cagliari Calcio and Cosenza Calcio 1914. Longobucco died on 2 April 2022 in Scalea, Italy at the age of 70.Addio a Longobucco, ex difensore della Juve e del Cagliari ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Footballers from Calabria
title: Silvio Longobucco
